A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This movie is a hot mess. Very pretty. No point. Some interesting scenes which are uncommon and hard to find. Movie is way too long. The space battles were horrible. They looked good but made no sense. Practically every scene was full of Deus ex Machina. Lea suddenly gets force powers. The most interesting character... the rogue... basically had no scenes and was not pivotal to the plot.

I could go on. This movie title might turn out to mean more than the creators intended. This could be the end of the franchise. It was HORRIBLE.

And let me be very clear here. It is not the fault of the actors\, the set designers\, the 3d graphics people... this is entirely on the Director and Writer.

What were you thinking with this script? This movie made Jar Jar binks seem clever. The horror.
